description.name: Charges for Services
description.description: Fees paid by residents and organizations for city services, ranging from hospital fees and building inspections to street cleaning.

description.name: Property Taxes
description.description: Taxes paid on property that is proportional to the property's assessed value.

description.name: Intergovernmental
description.description: Funding from the federal government, the state, and other local governments.

description.name: Business Taxes
description.description: Taxes collected from businesses, including gross receipts taxes, commercial rent taxes, administrative office taxes and others.

description.name: Hotel, sales, and misc. taxes
description.description: Hotel tax, sales tax, and other local taxes.

description.name: Rents & Concessions
description.description: Rental income and seller concessions for properties owned by the city.

description.name: Other Revenue
description.description: Revenue from licenses, fines, forfeiture, investment income and other sources.

description.name: Unappropriated Fund Balance
description.description: Unspent funds from a prior year that are now being used as revenue.
